Just use that ugly brat Mary as a shield."},{"lineNumber":8072,"originalJapaneseLine":"　盾にとればいいだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"It should work.\""},{"lineNumber":8073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「日常的にそれを行うわけにもいきませんし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But we can't do that on a regular basis...\""},{"lineNumber":8074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それにその、メアリーちゃんはいい子なので……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Besides, Mary is a good girl, so..."},{"lineNumber":8075,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あまり、そういうことも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"we don't want to put her through that too much.\""},{"lineNumber":8076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………めんどくさいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...This is troublesome.\""},{"lineNumber":8077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「連れてきたのはお前さんじゃろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're the one who brought her, right?\""},{"lineNumber":8078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……長いこと、集団で暮らしていないせいで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Because she hasn't lived in a group for a long time,"},{"lineNumber":8079,"originalJapaneseLine":"　周りに合わせるのが難しいのでしょうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's probably hard for her to fit in.\""},{"lineNumber":8080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ましてや、自分は周りより、圧倒的に強ぇもんな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Moreover, she's overwhelmingly stronger than those around her."},{"lineNumber":8081,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんで合わせるんだ、ってなったら……なぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"If she thinks, 'Why should I conform?'... well."},{"lineNumber":8082,"originalJapaneseLine":"「周りの人も……いつ殺されるか分からない、って」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The people around her... may also think they could be killed at any time.\""},{"lineNumber":8083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………うーむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmmm...\""},{"lineNumber":8084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ、チ……うるせえな…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch... shut up already...!\""},{"lineNumber":8085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おおぉっ、な、なんだ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-Oh! Wh-What is this...?\""},{"lineNumber":8086,"originalJapaneseLine":"　や、やる気、なのか……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you serious about fighting...?!"},{"lineNumber":8087,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それがお望みなら存分に、なァ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If that's what you want, then bring it on...!\""},{"lineNumber":8088,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、ああっ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah...!\""},{"lineNumber":8089,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おじ様、喧嘩が…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Uncle, they're fighting...!\""},{"lineNumber":8090,"originalJapaneseLine":"「喧嘩になるかい！　炭クズにされるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fighting? You'll be turned to ashes!\""},{"lineNumber":8091,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、めんどくさい……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, how annoying...!\""},{"lineNumber":8092,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ス、ッ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-s...\""},{"lineNumber":8093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「トーーーーーーップ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tooooop!!\""},{"lineNumber":8094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんだ。すっこんでろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What is it? Stay out of this.\""},{"lineNumber":8095,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今のは、レイが悪い！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was Ray's fault!\""},{"lineNumber":8096,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"..................\""},{"lineNumber":8097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほ……おぬしが魔人の縁者とかいう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ho... you say you are related to the demon Majin...?"},{"lineNumber":8098,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかと申しつけてくれよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Make sure to convey that properly!\""},{"lineNumber":8099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんたも悪いんだよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're bad too!"},{"lineNumber":8100,"originalJapaneseLine":"　挑発しやがって！」","translatedEnglishLine":"For provoking me!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんぎゃーーーーーー！！」
「ああっ、ランス様！」
まぶたをサメザンについばまれて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's eyelids were pecked by Samezan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはのたうち回った。
「ぐぬぬぬぬ、なにすんじゃー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gnnnnnn, what do you think you're doing?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目が潰れたらどーする！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will you do if you blind me?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くるるるる…………」
ランスが叫んでも、サメザンはどこ吹く風。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though Rance shouted, Samezan paid him no mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「迂闊に手ぇ出すから。
興奮しちまってるから、あとでな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I got excited, so it'll be later."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、所詮は畜生か！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn, you're just an animal after all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはシィルに手当てさせながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While having Seelu tend to him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぷんすかとその場を後にした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance stormed off in a huff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そんなに過敏にならんでも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You don't have to be so touchy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くる、くるるる……」
「まったく……お前はホント、
俺がメシ食ってる所を見るの、好きな」
「くあっ……」
答えるように喉を鳴らして、
サメザンは主が食事をするところを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Samezan intently watched his master eat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じっと眺め続けた。
それはサメザンにとって、
何にも変えられぬ時間であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was a time more precious than anything else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガッカリさせんなよ」
「総統が連れ帰った、魔人レイですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About the demon Majin Ray that the Commander brought back...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やはり、周囲との摩擦がどうにも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There still seem to be friction issues with those around her..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言うこと聞かないのか？」
「そうではないのですが……
何かあるたびに威圧する癖があるようで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She seems to have a habit of intimidating others whenever something happens,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コミュニケーションに問題が……」
「チッ。あのメアリーとかいうブスガキを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch. Just use that ugly brat Mary as a shield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 盾にとればいいだろう」
「日常的にそれを行うわけにもいきませんし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But we can't do that on a regular basis..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにその、メアリーちゃんはいい子なので……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides, Mary is a good girl, so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまり、そういうことも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we don't want to put her through that too much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………めんどくさいな」
「連れてきたのはお前さんじゃろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're the one who brought her, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……長いこと、集団で暮らしていないせいで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Because she hasn't lived in a group for a long time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周りに合わせるのが難しいのでしょうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's probably hard for her to fit in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ましてや、自分は周りより、圧倒的に強ぇもんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Moreover, she's overwhelmingly stronger than those around her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで合わせるんだ、ってなったら……なぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If she thinks, 'Why should I conform?'... well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「周りの人も……いつ殺されるか分からない、って」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The people around her... may also think they could be killed at any time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、チ……うるせえな…………！」
「お、おおぉっ、な、なんだ……！
や、やる気、なのか……！」
「それがお望みなら存分に、なァ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's what you want, then bring it on...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、ああっ……！
おじ様、喧嘩が…………！」
「喧嘩になるかい！　炭クズにされるぞ！」
「ええい、めんどくさい……！」
「トーーーーーーップ！！」
「……なんだ。すっこんでろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What is it? Stay out of this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今のは、レイが悪い！」
「ほ……おぬしが魔人の縁者とかいう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ho... you say you are related to the demon Majin...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかと申しつけてくれよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure to convey that properly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんたも悪いんだよ！
挑発しやがって！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're the one who brought her, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……長いこと、集団で暮らしていないせいで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Because she hasn't lived in a group for a long time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周りに合わせるのが難しいのでしょうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's probably hard for her to fit in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ましてや、自分は周りより、圧倒的に強ぇもんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Moreover, she's overwhelmingly stronger than those around her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで合わせるんだ、ってなったら……なぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If she thinks, 'Why should I conform?'... well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「周りの人も……いつ殺されるか分からない、って」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The people around her... may also think they could be killed at any time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、チ……うるせえな…………！」
「お、おおぉっ、な、なんだ……！
や、やる気、なのか……！」
「それがお望みなら存分に、なァ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's what you want, then bring it on...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、ああっ……！
おじ様、喧嘩が…………！」
「喧嘩になるかい！　炭クズにされるぞ！」
「ええい、めんどくさい……！」
「トーーーーーーップ！！」
「……なんだ。すっこんでろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What is it? Stay out of this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今のは、レイが悪い！」
「ほ……おぬしが魔人の縁者とかいう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ho... you say you are related to the demon Majin...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかと申しつけてくれよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure to convey that properly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんたも悪いんだよ！
挑発しやがって！」
